titleStmt.title: Vox laici, or, The layman's opinion touching the making alterations in our established liturgy in an answer to a letter from a member of the convocation : with some remarks on the (pretended) answer of Vox cleri / by J.R. in a letter to a friend.
titleStmt.author: J. R.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.
